Package blackcode.uiclass

Class Database

java.lang.Object
blackcode.uiclass.Database
public class Database extends Object
This class is use to do all database related activities

  • Method Details

    • dbConnect

      public static Connection dbConnect()
      This method will create the database connection if the connection is null or close
      Returns:
      Database connection

    • saveNote

      public static int saveNote(int userId, String title, ObjectOutputStream noteObject, String plainText)
      This method will insert the note value in the Notes table in the database
      Parameters:
      userId - Id value of the current user
      title - title value of the note
      noteObject - Note value as JTextPane object
      plainText - Note as a plain text
      Returns:
      Id value of the created note from this method in the database

    • getAllPlainTextNotes

      public static List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Integer,String>> getAllPlainTextNotes(int userId)
      This method will get all notes that belong to the current user as plain text
      Parameters:
      userId - Id value of the current user
      Returns:
      List of Note Ids & the notes as plain text from the database

    • getPlainTextNotesByKeyword

      public static List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Integer,String>> getPlainTextNotesByKeyword(int userId, String keyword)
      This method will get all notes that has specific character set in the plain text
      Parameters:
      userId - Id value of the current user
      keyword - keyword that user want to search
      Returns:
      Note Id & the note as plain text from the database

    • getFullNote

      public static Map<String,Object> getFullNote(int noteId)
      This method will get all notes that belong to the current user as the full note and the plain text
      Parameters:
      noteId - Id value of the note
      Returns:
      List of Note BLOB values & the plain note values from the database

    • updateNote

      public static boolean updateNote(int noteId, String title, JTextPane styledTextPane)
      This method will update the note that belong to the current user
      Parameters:
      noteId - Id value of the note
      title - Title value of the note
      styledTextPane - JTextPane that use for the Note
      Returns:
      True or False value based on the operation success or not

    • deleteNote

      public static boolean deleteNote(int noteId)
      This method will delete the note that belong to the current user
      Parameters:
      noteId - Id value of the note
      Returns:
      True or False value based on the operation success or not

    • countUserNotes

      public static int countUserNotes(int userId)
      This method will count total notes that belong to the current user
      Parameters:
      userId - Id value of the user
      Returns:
      Number of notes that the current user have

    • doesNoteExist

      public static boolean doesNoteExist(int noteId)
      This method will check if the note exists on the database or not
      Parameters:
      noteId - Id value of the note
      Returns:
      True or False by the present of the note

    • saveUser

      public static boolean saveUser(String username, String passwordHash)
      This method will save the user details on the User table in the database
      Parameters:
      username - Name of the user
      passwordHash - password HASH value of the entered password
      Returns:
      True or False value based on the operation success or not

    • updateUser

      public static boolean updateUser(int userId, String username, String newPassword)
      This method will update the username & the password on the User table in the database, if the user name already exists this will generate a message to the user
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of the user
      username - new username of the user
      newPassword - password HASH value of the entered new password
      Returns:
      True or False value based on the operation success or not

    • updateUser

      public static boolean updateUser(int userId, String newPassword)
      This method will update the user password on the User table in the database
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of the user
      newPassword - password HASH value of the entered new password
      Returns:
      True or False value based on the operation success or not

    • deleteUser

      public static boolean deleteUser(int userId)
      This method will delete the user details with the notes that belong to the user
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of the user
      Returns:
      True or False value based on the operation success or not

    • checkUserCredentials

      public static Map<String,Object> checkUserCredentials(String username, String password)
      This method will check if the entered username and the password is correct or not
      Parameters:
      username - name of the user
      password - user password
      Returns:
      User credentials with user Id, username and the encryption key of the user

    • encryptBackupFile

      public static String[] encryptBackupFile(String location)
      This method will create a encrypted backup file and save it in a given location
      Parameters:
      location - Location to save the file
      Returns:
      True or False value based on the operation success or not & output file path & pin for the encrypted file & the file name

    • decryptBackupFile

      public static boolean decryptBackupFile(String inputFilePath, String pin)
      This method will decrypt the backup file and import it as the new database
      Parameters:
      inputFilePath - Backup file path
      pin - Pin to decrypt backup file
      Returns:
      True or False value based on the operation success or not

    • generateRandomPin

      public static String generateRandomPin()
      This method will generate a random pin number that maximum length of 6
